posts.post_title: 1920s AZO RPPC Christy Mathewson and Harry Greb
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/exhibitman/saleholding/websize/65.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/exhibitman/saleholding/websize/66.jpg[/IMG]

$120 plus $4 delivered (domestic).  PayPal OK.  First to respond with acceptance of the offer gets it.
I'm possibly the one guy who enjoys the Pittsburgh angle in the card over Mathewson.

Doesn't say "sold", I'll take it if it's still available.:)
Jeff
